info.title: WeGive
info.description: In order to use this api, please obtain an integration API key from the WeGive Dashboard. If you do not have access to the WeGive Dashboard, please fill out our contact form at https://www.wegive.com/demo-request and read the terms of use at https://www.wegive.com/api-terms-of-use
